briefTitle: Long-term Safety Study of Open-label Pramipexole ER in Patients With Advanced PD
officialTitle: Long-term Safety Study of Open-label Pramipexole Extended Release (ER) in Patients With Advanced Parkinson's Disease (PD)
summary: The general aim of this study is to obtain long-term safety and tolerability data on pramipexole extended release (ER), in daily doses from 0.375mg to 4.5mg once daily (qd), in patients who have previously completed a pramipexole double-blind study in advanced Parkinson's disease (PD) (248.525 trial).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients With Adverse Events, Adverse Drug Reactions, Serious Adverse Events
